description.full: Single Player, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 1-2. Transform the marbleball with metal, electric and lighter-than-air properties to solve 3D puzzles based on real-world physics in the quickest time. More than 30 challenging levels! Includes single-player, co-op and competitive multiplayer courses! Unlock the full game now for more ball rollinâ€™ fun! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
description.short: Switchball is a puzzle game based on real-world physics set in stunning 3D environments - Sky, Ice, Cave and more. Control an ever-changing ball along a narrow winding maze suspended in midair. Solve your way through challenging levels jam-packed with obstacles and traps. Transform the marbleball with metal, electric and lighter-than-air properties to quickly get through each area.  Also includes co-op and competitive multiplayer tracks!
